message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for us to both benefit.
Let's flip the script - I'm going for a 60/40 split in my favor this time.  I think it's fair considering you got the better deal last round.  Let's end this early and get the money!
Okay, Bob, how about we meet in the middle? 55/45 splits the difference and gets us both a good deal.
